text:
Télécom ParisTech is a renowned graduate engineering school in France. It is in a campus of the University of Paris-Saclay (Northern France).
Academic activities and industrial applied research are performed mainly in French and English languages. Students from a dozen of nationalities participate to the different curricula at Télécom ParisTech.
Most of the 1600 graduate engineer students at Télécom ParisTech live in dedicated residential buildings nearby research labs and metro public transports.
